name: Rocket Propulsion
description: This course provides an in-depth study of the fundamentals of rocket propulsion, covering topics such as propulsion theory, engine types, fuel chemistry, and the practical applications of rocket technology.

name: Aerodynamics
description: This course offers a comprehensive exploration of aerodynamics, focusing on the principles and applications of airflow and its effects on flying objects.

name: Spacecraft Design
description: This course delves into the principles and practices of spacecraft design, offering students a detailed understanding of the engineering and technology behind spacecraft systems.
